11489.quoteText: We and our analytics or service providers, marketing partners, and affiliates may use cookies, web beacons, or pixels and other technologies to ensure everyone who uses the Sites has the best possible experience
11489.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11490.quoteText: In some instance, we work with third party vendors to employ cookies for the purposes of collecting Analytics Information.
11490.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

11491.quoteText:
We generally use Cookies for the following purposes:

To recognize new or past users.
To store your login session information if you are registered on our Sites.
To improve our Site and to better understand your visits on our platforms and Site.
To integrate with third party social media websites.
To serve you with interest-based or targeted advertising.
11491.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

11492.quoteText:
We may, however, revise the Privacy Policy from time to time.
If a revision is material, as determined solely by us, we will notify you, for example via email.
11492.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

11493.quoteText: You may choose at any time to cease using our website,
11493.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

11494.quoteText: We may, in our sole discretion, terminate this agreement, suspend access to our website, or remove any services immediately without notice for any reason.
11494.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time

11495.quoteText: We reserve the right to suspend or limit your access to the API in our sole discretion, and we will use reasonable efforts to provide you notice prior to suspension
11495.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

11496.quoteText:
In particular, you WILL NOT:

register for more than one account with us without written authorization
11496.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

tosdr.case: Service does not allow alternative accounts

11497.quoteText: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" BASIS.
11497.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

11498.quoteText: In addition, we may share certain information about you and your completed tasks to the Requester whose tasks you have completed to facilitate the service relationship and improve the website, including, for example, Contributor ID, IP Address, completed tasks, and other attributes related to your qualifications, languages, skills, and use of the website.
11498.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

11499.quoteText: If we suspend or terminate your account, you will no longer have access to any parts of the website, including data, messages, files, and other material you keep on the site. You may NOT continue to use our website under a different or new account name.
11499.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
